data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea mariana (Black spruce) from sample LCHEVPMA-121

Exposition SW, Slope 3 deg, Geology: Sand, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 50%, Herb cover 70%, Moss cover 85%, Vegatation type: Plenterw. m. viel ABBA-Unterw. (wie LPE), Film number: 841A
